page.title: 06EDUCATION - AUCHINLECK
page.content: Auchinleck has a fully comprehensive education system. The 3 - 5 year old children can go to Nursery School which is non-denominatonal. Non-Catholic children then go to Auchinleck Primary until 11 years old then Auchinleck Academy, a six year Comprehensive offering opportunities for S.C.E. 'O' and 'H' levels and Certificate of Sixth Year Studies. The Catholic children attend St. Patrick's until 11 years old then travel to St.Conval's in nearby Cumnock for four years.Then if pupils wish to continue with studies they travel to St.Joseph's in Kilmarnock or St.Margaret's in Ayr for S.C.E. 'H' and S.Y.S.Certificates.
